ygData.subject: Pet focus item quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a mage that is doing the pet focus item quests that are given by Vira in Solusek s Eye, and  I have already turned in the required items and received my
ygData.messageBody:
I have a mage that is doing the pet focus item quests that are given by Vira
in Solusek's Eye, and I have already turned in the required items and
received my Stein of Ulissa. However, when I tried to turn in the items for
my Broom of Trillion, Vira told me that Solusek Ro did not accept half
measures, kept my items, and did not give me the focus item.

She evidently felt that I had somehow failed to properly fulfill the quest,
yet I am certain I gave her all the correct items. When offering her an item,
the 4-slot trade-box opens with that item in the first slot. Does it matter
what order the items are placed in the slots?

The other thing I wonder about is that after I turned in my items and received
the stein, I talked to her about all of the other focus quests. I do not
remember what order we discussed them, but could she only be remembering the
last one we discussed and it was not for the broom?

Canostrol
32 Gnome Mage
Bristlebane
